title: Ocean breeze and ocean views here at Baker Beach!
app_fee: $46 application fee for credit and background checks
posting_body: The Presidio Residences is pleased to announce availability in our Baker Beach neighborhood.

Offered at $3,535 per month, 1569-E Pershing Drive is a 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom home with 780 square feet of space and an ocean view including the Sea Cliff and Land’s End, the apartment features hardwood floors, a spacious living/dining room, and renovated bathroom and kitchen with a dishwasher, refrigerator, gas stove and washer/dryer hookups.
Also included is a covered parking space with storage.
The location is a short distance to the beach, and the park's resident shuttle, the PresidiGo, is ideal for downtown commuters.
Prices reflect a twelve-month lease with a move-in date by or before August 12, 2022.
Please speak with your leasing agent for details.
Parking permit for each additional vehicle is $75 per month; and
Two household pets are permitted with an additional $500 deposit per pet, and there is monthly pet rent charged at $50 per pet per month.
Current vaccination records, spaying/neutering records, emergency caregiver contact information, and veterinarian contact information are required.
We want you to know that your health, along with the health of our residents and team members, is our highest priority.
Prior to touring, a leasing agent will go over our COVID-19 Health and Safety Precautions with you.
Wearing face masks for those who are unvaccinated is required during the tour.

Please do not attend the Open House if in the past 10 days you have experienced fever or chills, shortness of breath or trouble breathing, cough, fatigue, muscle or body aches, headache, sore throat, congestion or runny nose not attributed to allergies, new loss of taste or smell, or other flu-like symptoms.
All applicants must meet the Presidio Trust’s standard residential screening criteria.
This includes, in part, a credit check, criminal background check, verification of income and assets, and verification of past residences.
Our leasing office is open Monday through Friday from 9:00 am to 6:00 pm, and Saturday from 10:00 am to 4:00 pm.
We are closed on Sundays and holidays.
Federal law prohibits housing discrimination on the basis of race, color, national origin, religion, sex, familial status, or disability.
